version_description:
Apple Pay is now in the Chubbies App.  

What this means: You can subtract a few unnecessary clicks between desiring that Chubbies show up on your doorstep and Chubbies actually showing up on your doorstep. 

We just wanted you guys to have the simplest checkout process imaginable for the holiday season. It truly is the most wonderful thighme of the year. 

Yes. It IS that awesome.

Apple Pay is now in the Chubbies App.  

What this means: You can subtract a few unnecessary clicks between desiring that Chubbies show up on your doorstep and Chubbies actually showing up on your doorstep. 

We just wanted you guys to have the simplest checkout process imaginable for the holiday season. It truly is the most wonderful thighme of the year. 

Yes. It IS that awesome.

Apple Pay is now in the Chubbies App.  

What this means: You can subtract a few unnecessary clicks between desiring that Chubbies show up on your doorstep and Chubbies actually showing up on your doorstep. 

We just wanted you guys to have the simplest checkout process imaginable for the holiday season. It truly is the most wonderful thighme of the year. 

Yes. It IS that awesome.
New features and a buncha fixes. What a time to be alive.
New features and a buncha fixes. What a time to be alive.
New features and a buncha fixes. What a time to be alive.

Good news, my friends. Julyber Monday is coming June 20th at 8am pacific time. 12 gifts with purchase offered every hour for the whole day to ensure you have all the Chubbies for the 4th of July (the most important holiday on the Shortsgorian Calendar).

This release makes it super easy to get your gift-with-purchase by supporting the auto-application of gift codes, so now you don't have to manually enter those codes any more. Result: less friction between you and 4th of July being all that it can be. 

There are also about one zillion other tweaks and improvements. Size guide improvements. Set up Apple Pay so you don't have to enter credit card info anymore and you can just be like "I want shorts... ​*uses finger print to pay*​ ...DANG THAT WAS EASY". 

Oh yea and the app should feel a little snappier and responsive, as we've been working on improving the general performance. So that's good.

There are also about one zillion other tweaks and improvements. Size guide improvements. Set up Apple Pay so you don't have to enter credit card info anymore and you can just be like "I want shorts... ​*uses finger print to pay*​ ...DANG THAT WAS EASY". 

Oh yea and the app should feel a little snappier and responsive, as we've been working on improving the general performance. So that's good.

This release makes it super easy to get your gift-with-purchase by supporting the auto-application of gift codes, so now you don't have to manually enter those codes any more. Result: less friction between you and 4th of July being all that it can be. 

There are also about one zillion other tweaks and improvements. Size guide improvements. Set up Apple Pay so you don't have to enter credit card info anymore and you can just be like "I want shorts... ​*uses finger print to pay*​ ...DANG THAT WAS EASY". 

Oh yea and the app should feel a little snappier and responsive, as we've been working on improving the general performance. So that's good.

What up,

I'm the Chubbies App.

It's been a while since we've spoken, but it's just because I've been in the lab, with a pen and a pad, trying to get this awesome new version done.

Lots of new bidness for you to enjoy in this new version of me.

The Inbox - Get all the latest Chubbies videos, funny photos, Friday at 5 posts, new exclusive product for your weekend, every single day. Every time you come back to the app, your inbox will be busting with new yum yums.

Enhanced Shopping - It used to be kinda hard to find all the cool new stuff we were offering in the app. Sorry about that. My bad. Anyways, I fixed it, and now, with the Shop tab, it's maybe too easy to find all the great stuff you wanna buy for your weekends.

Better Add to Cart Experience - I can't tell you what it is yet, but let's just say it's more fun to add a product to cart. 

Near Lightning Speed - The app is a little bit faster, because again, nobody has time to wait for pages to load. When I want my Chubbs, I want 'em now.

Chat - Sometimes you just wanna chat with someone on Team Chubbies - ask some questions, get recommendations, or just talk about last night’s game. It's all possible, and the world is your oyster.

From all of us at Chubbies, thanks a ton for using the app - we hope you love this new version.

Sky's out, thighs out. 
– Rainer, Tom, Kyle, Preston and all of Chubbies HQ

Chubster Nation – thanks a ton for using the Chubbies App. Hope you’re loving it.

With this release, we focused on making the app way easier to use for you.

Summary: Fewer clicks between you and Chubbies.

Here’s a summary of the new features you get to enjoy:
• Search. Find exactly what you’re looking for without having to tap around looking for it.
• Apple Pay on the product page. Simply find a product you like, pick the size, and then just tap on the apple pay button and your purchase is completed in a few taps.
• Easier to get into the app. When you have the app installed and you visit our site on mobile web, there’s a link into the app so you can enjoy that premium app experience and speedier checkout.
• Fixes. sometimes, when too many people were using the app, it would close. We fixed it so everybody can use the app all the time 24 hours a day.

Heck of a year so far, Chubster Nation. So many great new products and hilarious videos coming through the rest of ’17. Pumped for you to see them.

Wanna search for the stuff you want from chubbies? BAM. Search is now prominently displayed on the homepage.

Wanna add products to cart when viewing a product collection? BAM. Add products to cart when viewing a collection. Who needs product pages anyway? I’m not sure.

Want exclusive access to the Chubbies Outlet? You’ll find it ONLY in the Chubbies iPhone app. The perks of being a Chubbies App user are real, and they are delightful.

So there you go. This is us, trying to make your lives easier with each release of this awesome app.

Enjoy your day, friends.

Tom, Rainer, Kyle, Preston and the rest of the Chubbies team at HQ

Release 1.7 is alllllll about the data, baby. We updated our internal event tracking so we can make this freak-of-nature application even better for you wild shortsnologists out there. This update will help us understand which of our products you guys are digging the most, and which of our products could use some improvement. It'll also help our designers make even cooler graphics for the app to upgrade your experience like whoa.

Overall not a huge update, but you can expect the same primo experience as always in this sports car of a Shorts Application.
So check it out when you get a chance.

I love you.

Chubbies

What’s that? Chubbies App Version 1.8 is here to rock your socks off and make Weekend Clothiery that much better??
That’s right, your favorite Weekendologists have released another funky fresh mobile app for your perusal. Not too much here outside of some performance improvements and some bug fixes, but I’ll be darned if it’s not the latest and greatest from our squadron of highly talented Weekend-gineers.

Enjoy it - if you have any feedback, please send it our way at info@chubbies.com.

Huge thanks for supporting the weekend revolution.

- Team Chubbies

WELCOME TO CHUBBIES APP VERSION 1.9 - TOO CHUBBIES APP, TOO FURIOUS

Important details that will rock your socks:
• New and improved navigation to make shopping our top selling collections easier, as well as making it easier to find all of our Outlet products
• We used to not be able to show more than 50 products in a collection. Now we can. #booyar
• Some more nice little design improvements you might catch when you're navigating the greatest Shorts application of all time.

Awesome, huge thanks for updating - we're just gonna keep making this thing better and better for you. As always, if you have any feedback, please send it our way at info@chubbies.com.

Warmest regards,
The Chubbies iPhone App

Boy oh boy, this one is a DOOZIE. If you were thinking about waiting around for the next release, and just hanging on to that same ol' 1.9 version of the App, I've got a word of advice for you - DO NOT. Instead drop your thumb down on that Update button right about now because 1.10 is one heck of an upgrade.

Here's why:

• New and improved chat functionality: This means it'll be even easier and smoother for you all to digitally hang out with Taylor, Jesse, Matt, Kathleen, Brooke, Scott and the rest of the Chubstomer Experience team than ever before. And you want to hang out with them. They're good peoples.
• The Outlet: we made that shopping experience jazzier and snazzier so make sure to check it out. Believe me. Jazzy and snazzy are not words I throw around a lot.
• Bug swatting: Those pesky ol' bugs have a tendency to keep on popping up but luckily we've got the most advanced bug swatting team on the market. And this time we've applied a healthy dose of OFF so we're going straight bug free since '93. You guys know what i'm talking about.
And now ONWARD, to the Weekend.

Sincerely,

Tom and the Chubb Club

Before you update to version 1.11 of the Chubbies app we’re gonna need you do the following, and do them in this order: 1) Buckle up, 2) brace yourself, and 3) hold on to your butt. Because this update is out of control awesome.

Here’s why:
Before this update, if you wanted to sign up to be the first to know about a product getting restocked, you had to use our mobile site Now, everything you need is in this app. Julyber Monday sign ups? Yep. Back in stock notifications on the products you want? Yeeeep.
We also made an update to ensure our size guides were are all up to date so you don’t get your first favorite product in your fourth favorite size.
But wait, there’s MOAR. Outlet: We increased the amount of deals we could offer in the outlet to maximum. We looked at the deals knob and turned it to 11.

And finally: Bug crushing. We took a bug bomb, dropped it in the app, closed the door, and came back 24 hours later to a bug free app.

We made changes to the backend of our app to make it run smoother, faster, cooler, radder, and notify our users when our newest app arrives, so you have the best FUNctionality possible.

The. Whole. Friggin. Thing. That's what's new. We took our old app and added all of the crucial backend stuff an app needs to function. Like a 3-day weekend, and a pinch of tiki drinks, and a dash of high fives, and a whole lot of good vibes.
What's new?

- We rebuilt the App from the ground up.
- New Menu and navigation features for easier way-finding.
- Improved homepage experience so you get to see all the new-new.
- According to our boss, we made it zippier, snappier, shinier, and betterer.
- Keep track of things you've been looking at with improved account features.

- New Menu and navigation features for easier way-finding.
- Improved homepage experience so you get to see all the new-new.
- According to our boss, we made it zippier, snappier, shinier, and betterer.
- Keep track of things you've been looking at with improved account features.

The. Whole. Friggin. Thing. That's what's new. We took our old app and added all of the crucial backend stuff an app needs to function. Like a 3-day weekend, and a pinch of tiki drinks, and a dash of high fives, and a whole lot of good vibes.
